title: A Children's Fable
brief_description: Three children, inspired by a program they saw on television, dress up in costumes and set out in search for the Holy Grail. Begun as a game, their quest becomes a terrifying adventure from which emerges a parable of racial confrontation and moral rebirth.
description: Three children, inspired by a program they saw on television, dress up in costumes and set out in search for the Holy Grail. Begun as a game, their quest becomes a terrifying adventure from which emerges a parable of racial confrontation and moral rebirth.
